Articles.Content:
Hey, everyone! I would like you to participate in this NASA mission replica challenge. The MER (Mars Exploration Rover) Mission had two rover launches with the Boeing Delta II rockets which carried the MER-A (Spirit) and MER-B (Opportunity) rovers to Mars. Then they landed and began their journey on the surface of the red planet. You can find more info about this mission on Google.

 

Rules:

No cheats are allowed during this mission

Send BOTH rovers to Duna

Physics altering mods are not allowed

 

Good luck trying to recreate this mission!

Duna or bust.
